text: - Availity is where healthcare connects.

We are the largest healthcare
network in the United States.
Availity's goal is

to help provide a delightful
healthcare experience
to patients, healthcare providers,

and health insurers. And we
needed to go through a bunch

of modernization to really
get to that next level
of delivering innovation to our customers.
We wanted to deliver more
data-based products, analytics,
and then AI solutions built on top of
that within our product lines.

Availity has had a
phenomenal experience working

with AWS on its conversion
to cloud technology.
It's been a complete partnership
between our two companies.

We have chosen to engage
AWS Professional Services
to help us in this endeavor.

They've integrated directly
into our teams added value on

day one, and have brought high
caliber engineers into our

teams to collaborate with
our engineers directly.

Availity supports a defense in
depth strategy for security,

and when we went to AWS with
the problem we were trying

to solve around security,
their engineers knew exactly
what we were talking about.
- FedRAMP stands for Federal Risk
and Authorization Management Program.

It's something that's
very difficult to achieve,
but we've been able to accelerate that.

If there was ever a sort of
catastrophic failure in one

of the regions, we're able
to be back up in just minutes
rather than hours.

So it's critical to us that
we master the technology

that we use and therefore
training is critical to us.
To execute on our training needs
for our cloud journey,

we've engaged AWS Training
and Certification.

We started using programs
like AWS Skill Builder,
We use Cloud Quest, which is sort
of a gamified training program.
We have about 800 software engineers,

all of them have gone
through some training.

A lot of them also are going
into more specialized training
like security training or Gen AI training.

In 2024, we focused very
much on using Gen AI

for operational
effectiveness improvements.

In the past six months, we've
deployed Amazon Q Developer,
Amazon Q Business
and Amazon Q in QuickSight

to help various individuals
execute on their
tasks more effectively.

With Q Developer, we've
been able to see about 33%

of the code is being written
by the Q Developer,
and it's a huge time saver for us.
- I can't say enough to
how supportive AWS has been in our Gen AI
journey at Availity.

They've provided all the
support we could ever want
to solve business problems
and be the foundation of new products.
